extensionDescription.message: KeePassXC integration for modern web browsers

contextMenuFillUsernameAndPassword.description: Context menu item for filling both username and password.

contextMenuFillPassword.description: Context menu item for filling password.

contextMenuFillTOTP.description: Context menu item for filling Time-based One Time Password.

contextMenuShowPasswordGeneratorIcons.description: Show password generator icon on every password input field.

contextMenuSaveCredentials.description: Save credentials using the extension popup icon.

rememberCredentialsPopup.message: Create or modify the credentials by clicking on the extension icon.
rememberCredentialsPopup.description: Notification text when saving credentials from the context menu.

multipleCredentialsDetected.message: Multiple credentials detected. Click on the extension icon to choose the correct one.
multipleCredentialsDetected.description: Notification when HTTP Authentication has multiple credentials detected.

errorMessageTimeout.message: Timeout or not connected to KeePassXC.
errorMessageTimeout.description: Timeout or not connected to KeePassXC.

errorMessageEncrypt.message: Cannot encrypt message or public key not found. Is native messaging or support for your browser enabled in KeePassXC?
errorMessageEncrypt.description: Cannot encrypt message or public key not found. Is native messaging or support for your browser enabled in KeePassXC?

passwordGeneratorLabel.message: also fill in the next password-field

passwordGeneratorAlert.message:
The generated password is longer than the allowed length!
It has been cut to fit the length.

Please remember the new password!

passwordGeneratorError.message:
Cannot receive generated password.
Is KeePassXC opened?

defineAlreadySelected.message: For this page credential fields are already selected and will be overwritten.

defineHelpText.message: Please confirm your selection or choose more fields as String fields.

credentialsMultipleFound.message:
Error:
More than one login was found in KeePassXC!
Press the KeePassXC-Browser icon for more options.

credentialsNoUsernameFound.message:
Error:
No credentials for given username found.

fieldsFill.message:
Error:
Cannot find fields to fill in.

fieldsNoPasswordField.message: Unable to find a password field

popupChooseCredentialsText.message: Choose own credential fields for this page

popupUpdateAvailable.message: You use an old version of KeePassXC.

popupDownloadNewVersion.message: Please download the latest version from keepassxc.org

popupNotConfigured.message: KeePassXC-Browser has not been configured. Press the connect button to register and pair with KeePassXC.

popupNeedReconfigure.message: KeePassXC-Browser has been disconnected from KeePassXC.

popupNeedReconfigureMessage.message: Press the reconnect button to establish a new connection.

popupConfiguredNotAssociated.message: KeePassXC-Browser has not yet connected to KeePassXC but has been configured using the identifier:

popupConfiguredAndAssociated.message: KeePassXC-Browser is successfully connected to KeePassXC and has been configured using the following identifier:

optionsCheckboxAutoFillAndSend.message: Auto fill HTTP Auth dialogs and send them.

optionsGeneralHelpText.message: If you just want to insert username + password into the fields where your focus is, press

optionsGeneralHelpTextSecond.message: If you only want to insert the password, just press

optionsCustomizeCommandsHelpText.message: You can customize these shortcuts on page

optionsBlinkTimeHelpText.message: What is the maximum time (ms) the icon should blink after detecting new credentials

optionsRedirectOffsetHelpText.message: What is the minimum time (ms) the icon should blink before deactivating due to page redirects.

optionsRedirectOffsetHelpTextSecond.message: -1 to only use Blink Time ignoring Redirect Allowance (old behavior)

optionsRedirectAllowanceHelpText.message: How many pages should the tab cycle through after the redirect offset before deactivating the icon

optionsUsePasswordGeneratorHelpText.message: For all password-fields there will be an icon added to generate a new password.

optionsUsePasswordGeneratorHelpTextSecon.message: It is generated by KeePassXC with the profile for automatically generated passwords for new entries.
